text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops fall soft and free
In the rain let's dance so wild
Jump and splash with every beat
Find your joy here like a child

[Verse 2]
Moonlight shines through cloudy skies
Twirl around with heart's delight
Lost in shadows laughter flies
Hold my hand we own the night

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing in the rain
Wash away all of the pain
Dancing dancing never stop
Till the sunrise makes us drop

[Verse 3]
Water sparkles on your skin
Electric love that's from within
Hold me close let's spin and spin
Let the music draw us in

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing in the rain
Wash away all of the pain
Dancing dancing never stop
Till the sunrise makes us drop

[Bridge]
Step by step and beat by beat
In the rain our world complete
Find the rhythm feel the heat
With each move our hearts repeat
title: Dancing in the Rain
